workExperience.title: Full Stack Developer at Divisions Maintenance Group

items.description: Led initiative to upgrade from React 15 to React 16
Revamped system's use of googles API to load google maps quicker. From 2 seconds to 100 milliseconds.

Worked closely with co-workers to help bolster their knowledge of react.
Built remote procedure calls for kafka topics to create a near-real time frontend application.
Responsible for major UI improvements that were praised by customers and internal teams.

Focused on cleaning up codebase to follow maintainable coding standards
Pair programmed with team members to accomplish complex tasks
